title: Binary Truth Seekers
description: Find words that represent yes/no answers in programming. They can be written in different cases but mean the same thing.
solutionSummary: This pattern matches boolean values by using alternation (the | symbol) which works like 'OR' - it matches either 'true' OR 'false' OR 'TRUE' OR 'FALSE'. The (?:...) creates a non-capturing group that groups the alternatives without creating a memory reference.
